isis.stitle: International® DT 466E, DT 466, 530, 530E, and HT 530 Diesel Engines - Vibration Damper, Crankshaft, Main Bearings, Flywheel, and Crankcase - Install - Install Main Bearing and Cap

note.para: Use new main bearing cap bolts whenever bearing caps are serviced.

step1.para: Clean Plastigage® from main bearing or crankshaft journal surface.
Coat all bearing surface journals and new main bearing cap bolts with clean engine oil.
Install main bearing cap 1 through 6, complete with lower bearing inserts.

note.para: Make sure main bearings are installed with arrow pointing to cam side and numbered from front of engine to rear.

step1.para:
Install new main bearing cap bolts and torque cap bolts to " Special Torque " follow " Main Bearing Cap Bolt Tensioning" procedure following the "Special Torque" table in this section
.
Insert main bearing cap with rear thrust bearing in position. Center rear thrust bearing by moving crankshaft rearward, then forward.
Torque two rear thrust bearing bolts to 136 N·m (100 lbf·ft) and then 177 N·m (130 lbf·ft).
Check crankshaft end play, mount the dial indicator on crankcase with indicator tip on crankcase flange face.
Lightly pry the crankshaft forward and zero indicator.
Lightly pry crankshaft rearward and monitor dial indicator reading. Repeat to assure an accurate reading.
If end play exceeds " Specifications ," replace thrust bearing and recheck crankshaft end play.
If end play does not meet " Specifications ," loosen main bearing caps, reposition, torque and check end play again.

Install piston and connecting rod assemblies. See " Install Piston and Connecting Rod Assembly
" in the Power Cylinders" section of this manual.

Install front cover. See " Install Front Cover (Front Half) Assembly
" in the "Timing Gear Train and Front Cover" section of this manual.
Install oil pump assembly. See " Install Lubricating Oil Pump " in the "Lubricating Oil Pump, Oil filter, and Cooler" section of this manual.
